    Changelog

    wildRtrax

    Overview

    wildRtrax (pronounced â€˜wilder tracksâ€™) is an R package that enables environmental sensor data users to create comprehensive work flows for managing and analyzing data. It simplifies the entire data life cycle by offering tools for data pre-processing, cleaning and analysis using data to and from WildTrax. With wildRtrax, users can easily establish end-to-end work flows and ensure reproducibility in their analyses. By providing a consistent and organized framework, the package facilitates transparency and integrity in research, making it effortless to share and replicate results.

    Installation

    You can install wildRtrax directly from this repository with:

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ABbiodiversity/wildRtrax")

    Or the development version with:

    remotes::install_github("ABbiodiversity/wildRtrax@development")

    Usage

    All functions begin with a wt_* prefix. Column names and metadata align with the WildTrax infrastructure. The goal is to follow the work flow of pre-processing, linking with WildTrax, download and analysis.

    • Pre-process acoustic data
      • wt_audio_scanner ğŸ”‰
      • wt_run_ap ğŸ”‰
      • wt_glean_ap ğŸ”‰
      • wt_signal_level ğŸ”‰
      • wt_chop ğŸ”‰
    • Organize acoustic media and metadata for upload to WildTrax
      • wt_make_aru_tasks ğŸ”‰
      • wt_kaleidoscope_tags ğŸ”‰
      • wt_songscope_tags ğŸ”‰
    • Download processed data from WildTrax
      • wt_auth ğŸ“· ğŸ”‰ ğŸ¦
      • wt_get_download_summary ğŸ“· ğŸ”‰ ğŸ¦
      • wt_download_report ğŸ“· ğŸ”‰ ğŸ¦
        • Available reports: main, project, location, recording / image / point count, tag, megaclassifer, megadetector, birdnet
    • Analyze data
      • wt_summarise_cam ğŸ“·
      • wt_ind_det ğŸ“·
      • wt_ord beta ğŸ”‰
    • Convenience functions

    Issues

    To report bugs, request additional features, or get help using the package, please file an issue.
